titles.title: Toy Origin for Toddler Safety Act
Toy Origin for Toddler Safety Act
To require manufacturers of consumer products to provide information on their Internet website relating to the location where products are manufactured or assembled.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Toy Origin for Toddler Safety Act - Amends the Consumer Product Safety Act to require every manufacturer of a consumer product to post on its website (if any) the location of the facility where the product was manufactured or assembled. Requires the manufacturer, if similar products are manufactured or assembled at multiple facilities, to make such information available by serial number or other identifier.
